name: Rift Eternal
text: Fusion Summon 1 "Etherym" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck by using materials in your hand, banishing materials from your GY, or returning materials you own from your banishment to your Deck. If this card is in the GY or banishment and was not sent there this turn, you can return 1 "Etherym" card from your banishment to your Deck; add this card to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Rift Eternal" once per turn.
